item.title: How to management patches in DWM
item.description: Introduction DWM only have less than 2000 lines of code. If you want to add more functionality for your DWM you need patches. There are two types of patches: The ones that fit to your personal taste The ones you think should be included in mainline. There are also have TWO patch methods.
